description: Variation of Condition 2 (approved plans) of planning permission PP/2012/5187 dated 11/02/2013 for 'Application for a replacement planning permission to extend the time limit for implementation of planning permission PP/2009/3985 dated 13/01/2010 for: lower ground floor excavation to the side and rear; three-storey side extension (to lower ground, upper ground and first floor) single-storey rear extension to lower ground floor level with rear roof terrace; internal reconfiguration to create an additional self-contained flat (a total of three self-contained flats): cycle storage and amenity space'.  To allow for alterations to the front facade, alteration of first floor window, installation of an additional entrance door, lowering of lower ground floor by 400mm in flat 1(lower ground floor flat) and the installation of 3 rooflights
